mapper.select: insert into sungwoo_test.JobRequest(Company_no, HireCnt, UseLang, UseOS, UseDB, Career, Requirement, YearIncome, Major, Advantage, ContractType, Field, Procedures, ReqDocument, ReqDetail, Telephone, Fax, Cellphone, Email, Name, Department, Position, Etc, Post, ReceiptDate) values (#{company_no}, #{hireCnt}, #{useLang}, #{useOS}, #{useDB}, #{career}, #{requirement}, #{yearIncome}, #{major}, #{advantage}, #{contractType}, #{field}, #{procedure}, #{reqDocument}, #{reqDetail}, #{telephone}, #{fax}, #{cellphone}, #{email}, #{name}, #{department}, #{position}, #{etc}, #{post}, #{receiptDate})
